name: Five Lives for the Cost Of None
description: We've up the stakes, five lives for the flip of a lever. Does that sound like a deal?

options.name: Track with Five Potential Sacrifices to the God of Apathy.
options.description: Five Humans are nailed down to this tracks, they scream as the train aproaches. All it would take to save them is one simple action...

options.name: Glorious Empty Track
options.description: The salvation of the brave! The end of apathy. Down this track the train could ride free, clean, and not covered in blood.
